tests.description: Verify that users can view their storm history
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: View Storm History
  Given the user is logged in and on the home page
  When the user clicks the history icon
  And switches to storm history feed
  Then the storm operations should be visible as a list

tests.description: Verify that users can filter storm operations by MSISDN
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Filter by MSISDN
  Given the user is logged in and on the history page
  When the user enters a valid msisdn in the filter field
  And clicks apply
  Then only storm operations with matching msisdn should be displayed

tests.description: Verify that users can filter storm operations by date
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Filter by Date
  Given the user is logged in and on the history page
  When the user selects a valid date range
  And clicks apply
  Then only storm operations within the selected date range should be displayed

tests.description: Verify that users can view individual storm details
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: View Storm Details
  Given the user is logged in and on the history page
  When the user clicks a storm operation card
  Then the storm details should be visible including client's msisdn, storm amount, and operation status
